name: Ricky Iwasaki
title: Wopanga Mapulogalamu
summary: Wopanga Mapulogalamu Odziwa zambiri, kufunafuna mwayi watsopano wogwira ntchito zazikulu. Ndimakonda kupanga kapena kuwonjezera ma code kuti ena agwiritse ntchito. Ndikukhulupirira kuti luso langa ndi laling'ono poyerekeza ndi intaneti, kotero ndimakonda kwambiri kugwira ntchito ndi zida zina, mautumiki, zilankhulo za mapulogalamu.

experience.title: Wopanga Mapulogalamu
responsibilities: Anapanga ndikugwiritsa ntchito mawebusayiti owopsa pogwiritsa ntchito React ndi Node.js
Kuthandizana ndi oyang'anira malonda kuti akonzenso zofunikira ndikuwonetsetsa kutumizidwa munthawi yake
Anapanga ndi kusungidwa RESTful APIs pa intaneti
Ma script adapanga kuti azisintha ntchito ndikuwongolera bwino

experience.title: Mphunzitsi Wothandizira Tennis
responsibilities: Kuphunzitsa njira za tennis pagulu la osewera 5-10
Kupangitsa phunziro kukhala losangalatsa komanso losangalatsa kwa osewera
Ndiwoyang'anira chitetezo cha osewera pabwalo, makamaka osewera achichepere ndi akulu, monga azaka za 3 ndi zaka 60.

experience.title: Wothandizira Wotuluka
responsibilities: Kusankha maoda a makasitomala pa intaneti
Kusunga nyumba yosungiramo zinthu mwaukhondo ndi mwadongosolo
Kusunga malo otetezeka komanso ochezeka kwa makasitomala ndi antchito

projects.name: Mbiri
projects.description: Webusayiti yoyankha yowonetsa ma projekiti ndi luso pogwiritsa ntchito matekinoloje amakono apawebusayiti
